title: The headwear rebellion has begun: The new Earebel with Bluetooth and Sound by JBL.
Earebel: The Revolution on Headwear
content: The brand new Earebel® Bluetooth® headphones with "Sound by JBL®": The Earebel Bluetooth headphones with "Sound by JBL" can be integrated into beanies and headbands of the three collections Sport, Style and Prime.

title: KT showcases AI speaker with built-in IPTV display and Harman/Kardon sound
content: HARMAN Embedded Audio applied speaker technology of its premium audio brand Harman/Kardon to KT ‘GigaGenie Table TV’, the first display type IPTV set-top box in Korea.

title: Panasonic Avionics Corporation
content: Panasonic Avionics Corporation (Panasonic) today announces its collaboration with HARMAN International to make JBL branded Serenity S1H headphones available to airlines and their passengers.

title: MSC Zoe AI virtual cruise assistant
content: MSC Cruises and HARMAN co-create the future of Cruise Experience using Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Smart Audio technology

title: Viewsonic M1
content: ViewSonic and HARMAN partnered to provide high quality audio to the M1 projector. The IF Product Design Award projector features dual Harman Kardon speakers, full HD (1080p) resolution, and is 3D compatible. Compact and lightweight, the M1 can be used in any room or on-the-go.

title: ShadeCraft
content: ShadeCraft has chosen audio & voice leader HARMAN International as its exclusive partner. HARMAN will provide the premium Harman/Kardon audio system for music and entertainment, as well as their Sonique far-field voice input technology for a fully-featured, voice-user experience.

title: Smartbeings
content: SmartBeings, Inc., has entered into a partnership agreement with Harman International Industries, to provide both the audio engineering and speaker design for WooHoo™, the world"s first AI-based interactive, affordable smart home assistant.

title: Netgear Orbi
content: Netgear and HARMAN collaborated to provide high quality audio to the Orbi Voice. The Orbi Voice is the world’s first mesh WiFi system that includes Alexa, a built-in speaker, and audio by Harman Kardon.
